name: Pineapple Banana Mint Smoothie
description: This tangy, minty smoothie may have more adult appeal than kid appeal, but it’s certainly one of my favorites. I particularly like it made with almond milk. The pineapple in this drink will give you your daily requirement for manganese, and it’s a good source of vitamins C, B1, B6, copper and dietary fiber.
recipeCategory: breakfast, easy, quick, shakes and smoothies
keywords: banana, pineapple, gluten-free, halal, healthy, high fiber, kosher, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 heaped cup (1/4 large or 1/2 small) chopped, cored fresh pineapple
3/4 cup plain low-fat yogurt, almond beverage or rice beverage
1 teaspoon mild honey (check the beverage you’re using to see if it’s sweet first; you may not need the honey)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender with 2 or 3 ice cubes and blend at high speed until smooth.
